scripts.docker:mysql-CONN: cross-env DATABASE_CONN="root:secret@tcp($(docker inspect --format '{{ .NetworkSettings.IPAddress }}' local-mariadb)":"$(docker inspect --format='{{range $p, $conf := .NetworkSettings.Ports}} {{$p}} {{end}}' local-mariadb | while IFS=/ read a _; do echo "$a"; done | sed 's/ //'))/mysql?charset=utf8 "
scripts.docker:mysql-IP: echo "$(docker inspect --format '{{ .NetworkSettings.IPAddress }}' local-mariadb)":"$(docker inspect --format='{{range $p, $conf := .NetworkSettings.Ports}} {{$p}} {{end}}' local-mariadb | while IFS=/ read a _; do echo "$a"; done | sed 's/ //')"
scripts.docker:mysql-PORT: echo "$(docker inspect --format='{{range $p, $conf := .NetworkSettings.Ports}} {{$p}} {{end}}' local-mariadb | while IFS=/ read a _; do echo "$a"; done | sed 's/ //')"
scripts.docker:redis-CONN: cross-env REDIS_ADDR="$(docker inspect --format '{{ .NetworkSettings.IPAddress }}' local-redis)":"$(docker inspect --format='{{range $p, $conf := .NetworkSettings.Ports}} {{$p}} {{end}}' local-redis | while IFS=/ read a _; do echo "$a"; done | sed 's/ //')"
scripts.docker:redis-PORT: cross-env REDIS_PORT="$(docker inspect --format='{{range $p, $conf := .NetworkSettings.Ports}} {{$p}} {{end}}' local-redis | while IFS=/ read a _; do echo "$a"; done | sed 's/ //')"
scripts.docker:start: cross-env npm run docker:redis & npm run docker:mysql
scripts.docker:env: cross-env npm run docker:start && npm run docker:redis-CONN && npm run docker:mysql-CONN
scripts.go:serv: cross-env npm run docker:env && go run ./server.go
scripts.go:serv-dev: cross-env  & npm run dev & cross-env go run ./server.go
